bill_payment.title: bill_payment.sub_title
Bill payment instructions: You can now load your wallet by using Bill payments option from your bank. Please follow these steps:

bill_payment.title: bill_payment.sub_title_2
Bill payment instructions: It is important you follow these steps carefully to avoid delays in Credit.

bill_payment.title: bill_payment.steps.step_1
Bill payment instructions: Login to your Bank and go to the Bill Payment Section

bill_payment.title: bill_payment.steps.step_2
Bill payment instructions: If you have already added us, simply select

bill_payment.title: bill_payment.steps.step_2_2
Bill payment instructions: and proceed with the desired amount.

bill_payment.title: bill_payment.steps.step_4
Bill payment instructions: your payment details and submit the payment.

bill_payment.title: interac_e_transfer.card_title
Bill payment instructions: ඔබේ මාර්ගගත බැංකුකරණය හරහා E-transfer ආරම්භ කරන්න

bill_payment.title: interac_e_transfer.sub_title
Bill payment instructions: You can load your Wallet with Interact E-transfer for up to 2000.00 CAD. Please, follow these steps:

bill_payment.title: interac_e_transfer.steps.step_4
Bill payment instructions: In 'Message to recipient', type your email: {{customer_email}}

bill_payment.title: interac_e_transfer.steps.step_7
Bill payment instructions: Initiate E-transfer through your Online Banking

bill_payment.title: notify_steps.notify
Bill payment instructions: ඔබේ මුදල් පසුම්බියේ මුදල් පටවන විට අපි ඔබට විද්‍යුත් තැපෑලෙන් දැනුම් දෙන්නෙමු. සටහන: ඔබේ මුදල් පසුම්බියට මුදල් බැර කිරීමට පැය 24 ක් ගතවනු ඇත.

bill_payment.title: notify_steps.note
Bill payment instructions: සටහන: ඔබේ මුදල් පසුම්බියට මුදල් බැර කිරීමට පැය 24 ක් ගතවනු ඇත.

bill_payment.title: continue_button_title
Bill payment instructions: Send me an email with instructions
